isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - DIAGNOSTIC SOFTWARE OPERATION - Diagnostic Trouble Codes - Procedure using Switches for CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL

svcproc.title: Procedure using Switches for CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL

step1.para: Set parking brake for the correct signal from the Electronic System Controller (ESC).
Turn the ignition switch ON. (Do not start the engine.)

figure.caption: Switches for CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL

step1.para: Press and release the CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL switches at the same time within 3 seconds of key ON.

note.para: There will be a 10 second delay from the time switches are pressed to the time DTCs are flashed.

step1.para: The red ENGINE lamp will flash once to indicate the beginning of active DTCs.
The amber ENGINE lamp will flash repeatedly, signaling active DTCs.

note.para: All DTCs are three digits. Code 111 indicates that no errors were detected. See Appendix B in this manual or form CGE310 for DTCs.

step1.para: Count the flashes of the amber ENGINE lamp in sequence. After each digit of the code a short pause will occur.

item.para: Three amber flashes and a pause indicate number 3.
Two amber flashes, a pause, three amber flashes, a pause, and two amber flashes and a pause indicate code 232.

step1.para: For more than one DTC, the red ENGINE lamp will flash once indicating the beginning of another active DTC.

After all active DTCs have flashed, the red ENGINE lamp will flash twice to indicate the start of inactive DTCs. Count the flashes from the amber ENGINE lamp. If there is more than one inactive code, the red ENGINE lamp will flash once in between each DTC.
After all DTCs have been sent, the red ENGINE lamp will flash three times indicating end of DTC transmission.
To repeat DTC transmission, cylce the key and press and release the CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL switches, at the same time, within 3 seconds of key ON. The ECM will resend stored DTCs.
Set parking brake for the correct signal from the Electronic System Controller (ESC).
Turn ignition switch ON. (Do not start the engine.)
Press and hold the CRUISE ON and RESUME/ACCEL switches at the same time.
Press and release the accelerator pedal three times within 6 seconds of key ON.
Release the cruise control switches to clear the inactive DTCs.
